text: Warning : This post contains spoilers for Ready Player One. Steven Spielberg ‘ s futuristic adventure Ready Player One isn ’ t just an FX - heavy blockbuster. It ’ s also a visual encyclopedia collecting several decades ’ worth of geek culture. Adapted from the 2011 novel by Ernest Cline, the film takes place in the far - off year of 2045, when humans like hero Wade Watts ( Tye Sheridan ) spend all their time in a digital virtual - reality realm called the OASIS. Within this world, they can freely indulge their obsessions with the movies, TV shows, and video games of the distant past … the “ distant past ” in this case being primarily the ’ 80s and ’ 90s.
